original_title: Govt. to double mid-day meals for school children
original_body_lines: A national program that currently provides a mid-day meal for schoolchildren will be doubled from the start of the next school term, Education Minister Susil Premajayantha said.
He said the ministry is currently providing a mid-day meal for 1.1 million schoolchildren.
The program was kicked off in January with the support of US AID, the World Food Program (WFP), and the government. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
